TopicTitle: what happened to the ship labels in flight?

Articles.Content:
It used to be that you could see target markers and labels for ships that were within a certain distance. Since 1.2 I've had to locate rendezvous targets visually, which is much harder.

Currently, I am driving away from my Mun lander in a rover, and looking back, I can't see the lander anymore! I wonder if I'll be able to find it again since all the craters look the same.

Is there an option to turn on the old labels so we can see our ships from far away?
I think the labels within 150m-200m were removed. If you target a vessel by double clicking it will show a label and range.

1.  It is an option in settings, which is now off by default.
2.  It can be toggled in game flight mode.
